title: Cant play rank
body: Hi guys I CAN'T PLAY RANKED..... i am level 38  and i have 10 champs plus the free champs so i have more then 20 champs. It says that i need 20 champs but i have the 20 champs.       PLZZZZZZ SOMEONE HELP ME. I waant to play rank to get better.

replies.body: Ahhhh those champs in the free weekly rotation do not count toward the total amount of champs you own. You'll need to personally own 20 to play ranked.
thanks bro. but are you sure that i have to own 20 champs
Yep! Free to play champions are simply unlocked for everyone but not counted towards how many you own.
